title: Workshop on Theme-Centered EMI Teaching Methods and Translanguaging Strategies

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate college-level English proficiency and basic lecture comprehension skills
context.additional_context: Conducted in a smartphone-based VR simulation environment, including activities that simulate real lecture scenarios

learning_goals: Learners can design effective knowledge delivery strategies in EMI (English as a Medium of Instruction) environments using a subject-centered teaching approach.
Learners can improve learners' cognitive understanding and engagement by over 30% by applying translanguaging strategies.
Learners can analyze and improve language-mixing usage scenarios through three or more virtual teaching simulations in a simulated environment.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
